import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Get prealert
 Gets a previously created prealert



`Function GetPrealert(Val Token, Val UUID, Val TestAPI = False) Export`

  | Parameter | CLI option | Type | Required | Description |
  |-|-|-|-|-|
  | Token | --token | String | &#x2714; | Auth token |
  | UUID | --uuid | String | &#x2714; | Prealert UUID |
  | TestAPI | --testapi | Boolean | &#x2716; | Flag to use test API for requests |

  
  Returns:  Map Of KeyAndValue - serialized JSON response from CDEK

:::tip
The prealert must be previously created. See CreatePrealert

Method at API documentation: [Details of prealert document](https://api-docs.cdek.ru/78935281.html)
:::
<br/>


```bsl title="1C:Enterprise/OneScript code example"
    Token = "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9....";
    UUID  = "04cc4644-336a-4b6c-b4fb-aa4920851f40";

    Result = OPI_CDEK.GetPrealert(Token, UUID, True);
```
 

 <Tabs>
  
    <TabItem value="bash" label="Bash" default>
        ```bash
            oint cdek GetPrealert \
             --token "***" \
             --uuid "eda59ce7-70db-4180-95a8-5ae2a2e4104b" \
             --testapi "***"
        ```
    </TabItem>
  
    <TabItem value="bat" label="CMD/Bat" default>
        ```batch
            oint cdek GetPrealert ^
             --token "***" ^
             --uuid "eda59ce7-70db-4180-95a8-5ae2a2e4104b" ^
             --testapi "***"
        ```
    </TabItem>
</Tabs>


```json title="Result"
{
 "entity": {
  "planned_date": "2026-01-07T05:42:51+00:00",
  "shipment_point": "NSK27",
  "orders": [
   {
    "order_uuid": "b4321466-ae48-4d98-af68-a2cf2ef2fbb7"
   }
  ]
 },
 "requests": [
  {
   "request_uuid": "aad3d320-1dcc-4b03-bc6f-8dff2f006cdc",
   "type": "CREATE",
   "date_time": "2026-01-06T05:42:51+00:00",
   "state": "ACCEPTED"
  }
 ],
 "related_entities": []
}
```
